name: @posthog/hogql-parser
description: WebAssembly HogQL Parser - Parse HogQL queries in JavaScript/TypeScript

scripts.build:wasm: emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm && emmake cmake --build build_wasm --config Release
scripts.build:ninja: emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm -G Ninja && emmake cmake --build build_wasm --config Release

author: PostHog Inc.
